source.73f25115:
fig, ax = plt.subplots(1, 1, figsize=(12, 7), sharey=True)

sns.countplot(x='race/ethnicity', 
              order=sorted(data['race/ethnicity'].unique()),
              hue='gender',
              edgecolor=(0,0,0),
              linewidth=2,
              palette='Set2',
              data=data, ax=ax)


ax.margins(0.05, 0.3)
ax.set_title('Grouped By Race/Ethnicity', fontsize=17, fontweight='semibold', loc='left')
ax.spines['top'].set_visible(False)
ax.spines['right'].set_visible(False)

ax.yaxis.label.set_size(12)
ax.xaxis.label.set_size(12)

# Annotation
for p in ax.patches:
    x=p.get_bbox().get_points()[:,0]
    y=p.get_bbox().get_points()[1,1]
    ax.annotate(f'{100*y/len(data):.4}%', (x.mean(), y+1), 
                ha='center', va='bottom')

# Legend
l = ax.legend()  
plt.setp(l.texts, fontsize=13)     
    
plt.show()

fig = plt.figure(figsize=(20, 7))

ax = fig.add_subplot(1, 2, 1)
sns.countplot(x='race/ethnicity', 
              hue='gender',
              data=data, ax=ax)

ax = fig.add_subplot(1, 2, 2)

sns.countplot(x='race/ethnicity', 
              order=sorted(data['race/ethnicity'].unique()),
              hue='gender',
              edgecolor=(0,0,0),
              linewidth=2,
              palette='Set2',
              data=data, ax=ax)


ax.margins(0.05, 0.3)
ax.set_title('Grouped By Race/Ethnicity', fontsize=17, fontweight='semibold', loc='left')
ax.spines['top'].set_visible(False)
ax.spines['right'].set_visible(False)
ax.yaxis.label.set_size(14)
ax.xaxis.label.set_size(14)

# Annotation
for p in ax.patches:
    x=p.get_bbox().get_points()[:,0]
    y=p.get_bbox().get_points()[1,1]
    ax.annotate(f'{100*y/len(data):.4}%', (x.mean(), y+1), 
                ha='center', va='bottom')

# Legend
l = ax.legend()  
plt.setp(l.texts, fontsize=13)    
    
plt.tight_layout()
plt.show()
